questions.question: What is the dominant color of the visible textile surface?
What is the most apparent textural quality of the fabric?
Considering the weave, what type of fabric is primarily suggested?
What is the overall shape of the presented textile item?
Based on appearance, what is the likely purpose of this textile item?
Describing the lines, are they uniform or varied in width?
What is the visible color of the border or edge of the item?
How many distinct color shades are perceptually evident in the item?
Does the textile exhibit a glossy or matte finish?
Considering the texture, does the textile appear to be soft or rough?
Judging by the visual, what is the general weight of the fabric?
What is the direction of the dominant lines displayed in the fabric?
Considering the spacing between the raised lines, would you consider the rib to be fine or coarse?
Judging from the image's sharpness, what is the weave density of the fabric?
Does the fabric show any noticeable pattern other than the ribbing?
